features: DESCALING SOLUTION: This professional grade cleaner will remove limescale and calcium buildup.
LIMESCALE REMOVER: Use on almost any steam oven as a solution for your toughest kitchen maintenance.
EASY TO USE: Simply add it into your machine's water tank and run the decalcification program.
CLEAN YOUR OVEN ONCE: You'll receive a 16.9 fluid-ounce bottle of our powerful commercial sanitizer.
MADE IN EUROPE: durgol kitchen and household products are developed and manufactured in Switzerland.
body.description: Designed to break up harmful calcium deposits and limescale buildup in steamer ovens, durgol Swiss Steamer is a professional grade descaler solution that will help you maintain and enhance the performance of your home kitchen's steamer oven. This descaler solution is made from phosphoric and hydrochloric acid to remove tough buildup and deposits. Unlike other citric-acid based solutions, this powerful cleaner will clean up even tough limescale buildup that could compromise the performance of your machine. Regular descaling of steam ovens will help machines perform at their highest level, so you can continue to host family, friends, and dinner party guests at your house! These descalers leave no residue, odor, or aftertaste and conveniently come ready for use with no preparation necessary. This powerful formula is designed specifically for steamer ovens and will work with nearly any brand. durgol Swiss Steamer descaling liquid is easy to use: simply fill the steam oven's water tank and start the decalcification program. If your steam oven doesn't have a decalcification program, simply distribute the descaler liquid throughout the water tank with a sponge. Let it stand, and then rinse and dry the water tank well.durgol descaling solutions are developed and manufactured in Switzerland, so you can be confident they meet strict safety and quality standards. Add these professional grade descaling products to your home kitchen supplies so you can be prepared for limescale buildup, calcium deposits, and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your coffee machine's heart attack is preventable. Thanks to regular descaling with durgol, you keep your machine healthy and you enjoy your superb quality coffee or espresso for a long time. Here’s what happens inside your machine:

DURGOL durgol is the only descaler that removes 100% of the limescale and will NOT leave any calcium citrate or calcium lactate build-up behind. Your machine is basically returned to “factory new". Citric Acid Citric Acid based products cannot remove 100% of the limescale AND form an extra layer of calcium citrate on top of the remaining limescale! Your machine has begun to fail. Vinegar Vinegar stinks up the house and descales very slowly. The coffee will taste like vinegar for a long time. Vinegar turns tubes brittle and porous. Ultimately, they will crack or burst.

Limescale is the bad cholesterol of coffee machines Limescale clogs up your coffee machine’s tubes and inner workings just like bad cholesterol clogs up your arteries.And if that wasn’t bad enough, there’s calcium citrate: It forms when you descale with citric acid based cleaners.Calcium citrate forms another layer inside your machine that cannot be dissolved by any cleaner (not even durgol)!You want both gone, for a machine that’s clean and pristine, happily pumping away for years of an active life.

Trust durgol, the World Market Leader The Swiss maker of durgol, Düring AG, has been a family business since 1951. Since the beginning, Düring AG has strived to ensure that durgol products undergo continuous development so they remain highly effective and safe for the planet. This high quality product removes limescale quickly and thoroughly, and Frieling is proud to be the American partner for this Brand of Distinction. durgol assurances Nothing works better and Nothing is easier! safe for ALL brandsno residue, no odor, no aftertasteextends the life span of the machineenvironmentally safe; 100% recyclable PET bottlesmade in Switzerlandready for useno need to dissolve in water (unlike powders and tablets)fast, yet effectivepowerful, yet gentle to the machineregular use ensures optimal coffee/espresso quality

Swiss Espresso Special Descaler Durgol Bathroom Cleaner and Descaler Universal Descaler Universal Descaler - 25.4 Ounce Kitchen Cleaner Designed For: "Swiss Espresso - Cleaning fully automatic coffee machines, including those with capsule and pod systems, filter systems, and espresso machines of all brands and types. " Bathroom cleaner and descaler removes lime buildup, hard water stains, soap scum and grime. "Universal - Cleaning many items, including kettles, filter coffee machines, sauce and frying pans, shower heads and nozzles, tap filters, sinks, chrome steel troughs, and aquariums. " Multipurpose decalcifier for countless use on household items. Kitchen - Cleaning countertops, chrome/steel surfaces, cooktops, microwave interiors, sinks, tiles, oven hoods, high chairs, even garbage cans! Volume: 4.2 ounces (x2) 16.9 ounces 16.9 ounces 25.4 ounces 16.9 ounces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for the Anova steam oven.
reviews.reviewText: I have an Anova oven and finally the dreaded descale light came on. I googled how to descale the Anova oven which stated to use a descaling liquid cleaner. This should be easy to find, right?? So, I did a search on Amazon to find a descaling cleaner many of which were for coffee makers. I found a couple for steam ovens and chose this cleaner because of the good reviews and also because it is recommended for Wolff Steam ovens.I ordered this descaling cleaner and received the next day. Descaling the Anova oven couldn't be easier. 1) Empty the water reservoir. 2) Mix 3/4 cup of this cleaner to 1 quart of distilled water and put the solution into the reservoir. 3) Put the flat tray into the bottom of the oven, close the oven, and press the descale button. 4) After 30-35 minutes, the first phase of descaling is done. 5) Empty water from the tray and dry the bottom of the oven. 6) Empty any solution left in the reservoir, rinse it, and add 1 quart of distilled water. 7) Press the start button to continue to the 2nd phase of descaling which takes about 10 minutes. 8) When this phase is done, empty water from the bottom tray and dry it. 9) Dry the bottom and sides of the oven and leave it open for a few minutes to completely dry.10) Done!!I hope this review was helpful for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This our go-to de-scaler
reviews.reviewText: We have a Wolf steam oven and this works flawlessly. This is the only de-scaler we use.

This product is recomended by the manufacturer or our steam oven. (Wolf) we used the full bottle as instructed. The Wolf oven has an auto menu for cleaning that prompts when cleaning is done. A few rinse cycles later it was good to go. It wasn't a messty process nor did the product have a strong smell. We went back to enjoying the tatsty food a clean steam oven can bake!
Das beste Produkt für Dampfgarer, da das Produkt flüssig ist und genau die richtige Reinigerkonzentration für die empfindlichen Dampfgarer hat.

reviews.reviewTitle: Il meglio che ho trovato per ora...
reviews.reviewText: Dopo avert provato la confezione bi-pack del 125ml ho deciso di prendere anche questo.Complice una buona offerta trovata su questo prodotto.Per ora si aggiudica senza dubbi la palma d'oro degli anticalcare provati.(avrei curiosità di provare la versione espress)Scioglie il calcare e se lasciato agire lo trasforma in una specie di spuma facile da rimuovere.A più riprese la superficie trattata torna nuova.La rimozione del calcare avviene proporzionale te alla quantità di prodotto applicata.Ne sono rimasto soddisfatto.Piccola nota dolente il costo.Se lo trovate in offerta non esitate, provatelo.Se ti sono stato utile, premi l'apposito tasto.

Produit conforme. Vite livré. Le prix pour l'époque était attractif.Côté four on peut faire quelques économies en divisant par deux la quantité requise.Après essai, le système de détartrage de mon four (Suisse :-) ) semble se satisfaire de la demi-dose. Alors là, le prix devient très compétitif.

This is the only product that Wolf appliances recommends to descale their steam ovensMy steam oven kept showing that it needed to be descaled I had no idea that was something that needed to be done, but when you consider that you use tap water, yes I think it does need to be maintainedIt not for cleaning the inside of the oven it just descales all the parts that have to be cleaned to make it work efficiently, it was worth the money and I would definitely not cheap out on a another product for a expensive applianceThank you will buy again
